name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 21, a man posted a video saying that he was a fan of Sima Nan when he was in college, and he always talked about the proletariat.
It was not until he began to learn about philosophy, law, and psychology that he realized that his previous view of the problem was too stupid and one-sided. The complexity of human nature and society is far from being summarized by a grand narrative like the proletariat. In particular, academic work must be rigorous and logical, and not make big and broad empty words.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 21, Wenling, Zhejiang. The boss of Jianxuan Shoe Factory fled, and the workers jumped off the building to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is worth noting that Li Yixue was assessed as having complete recognition and control abilities and full responsibility in the appraisal report.
A lawyer submitted that the notice on Li Yixue's medical treatment had legal errors regarding the "right to send for medical treatment". The law does not give government agencies the right to forcibly send "people who have not harmed themselves or others".
According to Article 28 of the Mental Health Law,
Article 28 In addition to individuals going to medical institutions for mental disorder diagnosis on their own, close relatives of suspected mental disorder patients can send them to medical institutions for mental disorder diagnosis. For suspected mental disorder patients who are homeless and begging and whose close relatives cannot be found, the local civil affairs and other relevant departments shall help send them to medical institutions for mental disorder diagnosis according to the division of responsibilities.
If a suspected mental disorder patient harms himself or others, or is in danger of harming himself or others, his close relatives, the unit where he works, and the local public security organs shall immediately take...
fullContent:
值得注意的是，李宜雪在该份鉴定报告中被评定为辨认、控制能力完整，有完全责任能力。
有律师投稿，李宜雪送诊的通报有关于“送诊权”的法律错误，法律没有赋予政府机构对“没有伤害自身或危害他人行为的人”强制送诊的权利。
根据精神卫生法第28条规定，
第二十八条　除个人自行到医疗机构进行精神障碍诊断外，疑似精神障碍患者的近亲属可以将其送往医疗机构进行精神障碍诊断。对查找不到近亲属的流浪乞讨疑似精神障碍患者，由当地民政等有关部门按照职责分工，帮助送往医疗机构进行精神障碍诊断。
疑似精神障碍患者发生伤害自身、危害他人安全的行为，或者有伤害自身、危害他人安全的危险的，其近亲属、所在单位、当地公安机关应当立即采取措施予以制止，并将其送往医疗机构进行精神障碍诊断。
医疗机构接到送诊的疑似精神障碍患者，不得拒绝为其作出诊断。
根据法条来说，街道和社区是完全没有送诊权的，只有近亲属有送诊权。 即使是他危害了其他人的安全，送诊权也是在近亲属，单位和当地公安机关处理，相关街道和社区没有权力送诊。 而侮辱，诽谤这一行为实务上应该不能构成“危害了其他人的安全”，这不符合精神卫生法的立法本意。
因此这个“社区街道依法依规将其送诊”，这个依法依规大家可以问一问当地执法机构究竟依照的是哪个法规？
另外提醒大家一句，送诊不是强制住院治疗，不用过夜的。因此理论上李宜雪应该当天看完病之后回家。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizen contribution: Recently, a woman in Hengyang County sat outside the window to demand her salary: she has been owed wages since 2014, and now her husband is sick and the medical expenses are 10,000 or 20,000 yuan a day, but the developer is not paying a penny.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Yesterday was the winter solstice, and also the first anniversary of the death of Zhu Ling, the victim of the thallium poisoning case at Tsinghua University. Thirty years have passed since the incident, and the murderer is still at large.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 16, migrant workers in Wuhan, Hubei gathered and marched to demand their wages from Jiuzhoutong Pharmaceutical Group. On the same day, representatives from the German Bayer Group visited the pharmaceutical company's campus.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 11th, Dongguan, Guangdong: Yichang Shoes closed down due to the boss running away, and workers blocked the road to demand their wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 20, Heilongjiang, Harbin, Junhao Apartment, owners gathered to protest against the unfinished project, the developer has delayed the delivery of the house for 3 years
December 20, Jiangxi Shangrao, Poyang County, Shili Fenghe Yueyuan, owners gathered to protest against the developer's delay in delivering the house, the property was still on sale, and the owners and the developer staff quarreled

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 20, villagers from Shibi Village 2 in Guangzhou, Guangdong went to the village committee to demand rent. A group of old ladies blocked the entrance of the village committee and refused to let anyone in, shouting slogans in unison.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Guangxi Guigang Luohe Village Daketun Villagers gathered to protest the failure to implement resettlement for many years. A group of police set up a shield line in the distance

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Yuren Primary School in Zhengzhou Economic Development Zone ran away. Parents held hands and built a human wall to block the intersection to defend their rights. Video supplement, police and special police intervened at the scene.
At present, all related videos have been deleted on Douyin

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 11, Jinan, Shandong: Workers gathered outside Jilai Holding Group to protest their rights and demand their wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 23, the Ministry of State Security warned: Beware of spies in the comment section.
The national security agency found that in recent years, some foreign spy intelligence agencies have used the comment section of online social media to steal our secrets, disrupt the order of the network, and pose a threat to our national security.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 17, China.com reported: "Remembering the 26 years of perseverance of Wang Yanchun, a tobacco deliveryman in Huangshi. She demonstrated her love for tobacco logistics with full enthusiasm and professionalism..."
Netizens responded, "Let me share the hard work of the elder sister, mainly because I am more dedicated."
Currently, the report has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens commented on the "Jiangxi Li Yixue incident": You, me, and it are all "patients" who were forced into a huge mental hospital like Li Yixue

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 23, the construction of Country Garden in Hengyang was suspended and unfinished. The owners marched all the way to the municipal government to defend their rights. During the march, they were violently pushed and forcibly expelled by the police. Some owners were injured and fell to the ground, and some rights-defending owners were taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 23 report from Hangzhou, Zhejiang. Mr. Wu reported to the media that his son's company sold a "X bath medicine bag" and someone reported to the police in Wuxi County, Chongqing, saying that they were defrauded of 1,682 yuan for buying this medicine bag.
The Wuxi County police filed a case for fraud. Four days later, they organized hundreds of police officers to come to Hangzhou across provinces, arrested his son and company employees across provinces and brought them to Chongqing, and seized tens of millions of yuan of the company's funds. When the police fined, they used their personal accounts to collect the money without issuing any receipts.
Mr. Wu questioned the Chongqing police's deep-sea fishing, and 1,682 yuan did not meet the standard for filing a fraud case.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Liu Xiaonan, an unemployed Chinese man, drove his car and killed an 87-year-old woman in Osaka at noon on the 21st.
Afterwards, Liu Xiaonan drove away from the scene without caring about anything. The police found him based on the cameras near the scene. When he was taken away by the police, his alcohol concentration was found to be above the standard.
Liu Xiaonan said that he noticed that the car hit something at the time of the accident, but he did not feel that it was a person.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 23, Liaocheng, Shandong. Citizens held up Mao Zedong's portrait in front of the government building to protest their rights, while the police could only stand aside and watch.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 20, a "Back to the Soviet Union" themed event was held in Beijing. The event was held within the framework of historical and patriotic activities and aimed at introducing Russian history to the Chinese public.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, it was reported online that a large number of foreign-funded enterprises had withdrawn from Suzhou. The Suzhou Municipal Supervision Bureau refuted the rumor: the news was false. In October this year, foreign investment in Suzhou increased by 1.91% year-on-year, which aroused doubts from netizens.
Netizens replied, "Anyway, our foreign customers have left, and our business has shrunk by about 1/4 this year."
"Suzhou Industrial Park is very desolate" "Most of them have moved to Vietnam"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 23, Li Yixue's grandfather issued a statement to the court, saying that he had watched her (Li Yixue) grow up since she was a child, and in daily life, he did not notice that his granddaughter was very different from other people of the same age.
He was shocked and angry that she was inexplicably sent to a mental hospital by the police station. He hoped that the court would give his granddaughter justice.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the afternoon of December 23, the first instance verdict of the murder case of Henan female judge Wang Jiajia was announced. The defendant Dang Zhijun was convicted of intentional homicide and sentenced to death with deprivation of political rights for life. 
Earlier media reports said that Dang Zhijun was dissatisfied with Judge Wang Jiajia for not fully supporting her demands, so he entered the underground garage of Wang Jiajia's community with a weapon and waited for an opportunity to commit the crime and killed her.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Russia issued fake documents to North Korean soldiers to conceal their existence.
Documents seized by Ukrainian troops from dead North Korean soldiers. The documents contained a fake name and the birthplace was Shoigu's hometown, the Republic of Tuva.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 22, Zhaoqing, Guangdong. Xingute Auto Parts Company issued a notice: Employees who refuse to work overtime will be fined 50 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Assad's British wife, Asma Assad, reportedly filed for divorce due to dissatisfaction with life in Moscow and wanted to move to London.
Asma applied to the Russian court for special permission to leave Moscow, and her application is currently being evaluated by Russian authorities.
The BBC reported that Assad has dual British and Syrian citizenship.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 23, Yangjiang, Guangdong. It was reported online that a shooting occurred at Liancheng Logistics Company.
The online information said: The suspect Lin Mei (male, 62 years old) shot at the owner of the logistics company, Wei Jiangwen, with a gun-like object. He then committed suicide by swallowing the gun.
The suspect Lin Mei and the victim Wei Jiangwen died after failed rescue. Wang Liyi was injured in the leg and was sent to the hospital for treatment. According to preliminary information, the suspect Lin Mei and Wei Jiangwen had a grudge.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Report on December 21:
"With 8,000 yuan, he made 1.3 million in half a year, which caused heated discussions. He did it by selling sesame cakes"
"The street stall economy is hot! Jinan boss earns 40,000 a day, concept stocks set off a daily limit, and Alibaba and Tencent, two giants, also came to help"
"University teacher sells fish balls and makes 1.4 billion a year"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the Jiangxi Li Yixue incident attracted attention, an old People's Daily newspaper began to circulate on the Internet.
The report said that Brezhnev's traitor group labeled dissidents as "mentally ill" and threw them into "mental hospitals" for arbitrary persecution. Their methods were more brutal than Hitler's concentration camps and prisons.
The picture has been deleted by the platform one after another.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 21, Song Kai, chairman of the Chinese Football Association, said: Party leadership and the national system are magic weapons, but Chinese football has not used them well, so we must strengthen the party's leadership.
Netizens responded, "Finally found the root of the problem, down with the anti-party group that doesn't play football well" "In the future, if we lose in international competitions, everyone from the team leader to the players will be treated as anti-party"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Unable to bear the torture, a pneumoconiosis patient committed suicide and left dozens of poems.
Recently, Dengfeng, Henan. More than ten years after being diagnosed with pneumoconiosis, Gao Chun is now skinny and only has skin and bones. Unable to bear the pain and torture, and not wanting to continue to implicate his family, he pulled out the oxygen tube and ended his life.
Gao Chun now has countless painful and sleepless nights, recording his silent sorrow. It was not until after his death that his son saw his father's poems that "only family members cannot see"...
